text: T. V. R Shenoy (1941 - April 17, 2018) was an Indian journalist and columnist. Shenoy had served as the editor of the weekly news magazine The Week and Sunday Mail and held many posts in The Indian Express and Malayala Manorama. He was born in Kerala, India. He was a member of the Board of Trustees of India First Foundation. He was awarded the Padma Bhushan award in 2003. Shenoy died on April 17, 2018 at a hospital in Mangalore, India at the age of 77.Veteran journalist TVR Shenoy passes away in Mangaluru ==References== ==Other websites== *India First Foundation *Kamat.com * Category:1941 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Indian journalists Category:Columnists Category:Writers from Kerala
